alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Clay; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 8:06PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHERN ST. JOHNS...NORTHERN CLAY AND SOUTHERN DUVAL COUNTIES THROUGH 845 PM EDT... At 805 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Middleburg to near World Golf Village to near Vilano Beach. Movement was north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Orange Park, Green Cove Springs, Unf, Mandarin, Fruit Cove, Arlington, Middleburg, Ponte Vedra Beach, and Jacksonville Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Clay; Western Duval
